lw3dge.graphics.models

Class RawModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • lw3dge.graphics.models.RawModel

  • public final class RawModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a VAO as a Java Object Notice this class is FINAL and therefore NOT editable after instantiation.
    Author:
    Jared Massa
